Episode.GuestStars: |Andrew Miller|Brad Sachs|Christina Miles|George Miserlis|Hayden Bromberg|Jordan Zucker|Mike Peebler|Ming Lo|Paul Adelstein|Paul Shively|Philip McNiven|Randall Keenan Winston|Rowbie Orsatti|
Episode.Overview: Dr. Cox starts drinking after his decisions result in the death of three of his patients. The staff tries to cover for him at the hospital, while everyone tries to convince him how inspiring he is for them. Turk starts his new rotation with orthopedic surgery, but isn't so fond of his attending doctor's touchy-feely methods. Thus, J.D. and the Janitor attempt to help Turk find ways to bond with his new supervisor.
